attributes.action: Abolish All Plans To Reverse Clayton V Clayton, And Enforce A Law Preventing Parents & Children In Care Releasing Their Stories To The Media & Press
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jack Straw is planning to reverse Clayton V's Clayton, therefore effectively banning ALL parents and children in care from speaking out releasing their stories to the media & press.  Any miscarriage of justice or breach of the law by a government agency/organisation is in the public interest, therefore should be brought out into the public domain & reported upon.  Children in local authority care also need an avenue to speak out about any maltreatment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish All Plans To Reverse Clayton V Clayton, And Enforce A Law Preventing Parents & Children In Care Releasing Their Stories To The Media & Press." 

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23081

Prime Minister's Office
